synopsis.text: Todoroki Takaya, a young, ambitious racer with dreams of reaching Formula One, constructs his own car, the Todoroki Special, to compete in local races. However, a mechanical failure during a race leads to a fiery crash, ending his hopes of victory. Despite this setback, Takaya's talent is recognized by Nick Lambda, a legendary retired driver, who offers him a chance to join Katori Motors. As Takaya embarks on a journey to compete in races around the world, he is guided by the mysterious and intermittently appearing Lambda, who helps him hone his skills and stay on the path to achieving his dream of becoming a champion racer. With determination and resilience, Takaya must prove his worth to the racing world and conquer the challenges that lie ahead.
